scripts.dev:ios: npm run env:local && flutter run -d iPhone
scripts.dev:android: npm run env:local && flutter run -d android
scripts.dev:prod:ios: npm run env:prod && flutter run -d iPhone
scripts.dev:prod:android: npm run env:prod && flutter run -d android
scripts.build:ios: npm run env:prod && flutter build ios --release
scripts.build:android: npm run env:prod && flutter build apk --release
scripts.clean: flutter clean && rm -rf ios/Pods ios/.symlinks ios/Flutter/Flutter.framework ios/Flutter/Flutter.podspec
